welcome_message_body: Welcome to Aldershot, a charming town known for its military history and beautiful parks. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring all that this unique city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Station Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at RAF Station Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lasham Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lasham Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving a variety of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Heathrow Airport, with modern facilities and a large duty-free shopping area.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A major hub for long-haul flights, with a variety of shops, restaurants, and lounges.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: A hub for SkyTeam airlines, with a range of international destinations and amenities.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The main terminal for British Airways, with a luxury shopping area and multiple lounges.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, with a 45-minute time limit per session.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Goodwood Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Goodwood Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Northolt Airport caters to private and executive flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights and some domestic flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic flights and some international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
